title: Special guest Cam Heyward joins the show!
description:
Mina talks to Steelers All-Pro defensive tackle Cam Heyward about the greatness of Mike Tomlin, why he believes he should be in the same company as Aaron Donald, the evolution of the game since he's been in the league, how many more years he'd like to play, his interest in media, and why he was ready to fight Ryan Clark one day.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Omaha Productions, Mina Kimes
